trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_for" name="for" href=""></xref> statement, or a loop through a block of statements, using a test expression as a condition for continuing to loop.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_for" name="for" href=""></xref>语句或循环使用的测试表达式作为继续的条件循环的语句块。

trans-unit.source: A CodeIterationStatement can represent a `for` loop or `while` loop.
trans-unit.target: 可以表示 CodeIterationStatement`for`循环或`while`循环。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.InitStatement%2A> property specifies the statement to execute before the first loop iteration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.InitStatement%2A>属性指定要在第一次循环迭代之前执行的语句。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.InitStatement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.TestExpression%2A> property specifies the loop continuation expression, which must evaluate to `true` at the end of each loop iteration for another iteration to begin.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.TestExpression%2A>属性指定循环延续表达式计算结果必须为`true`末尾的另一个迭代开始每个循环迭代。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.TestExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement%2A> property specifies the statement to execute at the end of each loop iteration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement%2A>属性指定要执行的每个循环迭代末尾的语句。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.Statements%2A> property specifies the collection of statements to execute within the loop.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.Statements%2A>属性指定要在循环内执行的语句的集合。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.Statements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement"></xref> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement"></xref>类使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> containing the loop initialization statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>包含循环的初始化语句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> containing the expression to test for exit condition.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>包含要测试的退出条件的表达式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> containing the per-cycle increment statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>包含每个循环递增的语句。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> containing the statements within the loop.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref>包含在循环内的语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the statement that is called after each loop cycle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在每次循环循环之后调用的语句。

trans-unit.source: This statement is called after each iteration.
trans-unit.target: 此语句在每次迭代之后调用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> that indicates the per cycle increment statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> ，该值指示每个周期增量语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the loop initialization statement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置循环初始化语句。

trans-unit.source: You can specify an empty initialization statement by setting this property to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement> that contains a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> that contains an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将此属性设置为指定空的初始化语句<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement>包含<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression>包含一个空字符串。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetExpression> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> that indicates the loop initialization statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> ，该值指示循环初始化语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of statements to be executed within the loop.
trans-unit.target: 获取要在循环内执行的语句的集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> that indicates the statements within the loop.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> ，该值指示在循环内的语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression to test as the condition that continues the loop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要测试作为循环继续的条件的表达式。

trans-unit.source: If this expression resolves to `true`, the loop will continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果此表达式解析为`true`，则循环将继续。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the expression to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，该值指示要测试的表达式。
